english.segment1: You ask me the question " Why?. I'll give you the answer " In time. I'll give you a drawing of all. I'll paint you a picture of Jesus " He's all. He is all, He is all you ever wanted, He is all
english.segment2: What if I was stranger than angels. Cause then I would be the one
english.segment3: Turn around " And see. The waves of the ocean and of the sea. I'll show all the moons of Mars. The love of heaven and of the stars
english.segment4: Cause he is all, He is all I ever wanted. He is all, He is all
english.segment5: What if I was stranger than angels. Cause then I would be the one
english.segment6: What if I was stranger than angels. Cause then I would be the one. Be the one
